long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrate your CRM with Cloudworx VoIP Solutions. The Cloudworx CRM Integration connects to your phone system allowing access to features like click to call, screen pops, call history, presence, and more. On top of integrating with the phone system, the Couldworx extension allows you to connect to various CRM tools for call logging and data migration.
long.ja,zh_CN,zh_TW: Integrate your CRM with Cloudworx VoIP Solutions.  Features include click to call and screen pop.
